article: The western world has always been divided into two types of people--the cool and the uncool. It is a  _  that starts in school. The cool kids are good at sports. Make friends with them now or they will put virus in your computer and  _  your maths homework to ruin. Geeks might not be popular at school, yet they do pass their examinations.
